name: Engulfer of Shores
text:
When Engulfer of Shores enters the battlefield, destroy X target artifacts and/or enchantments., where X is the number of flooded lands on the battlefield plus one.
Flood {2}{g}{g} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{g}{g} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)
Whenever you flood Engulfer of Shores, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
